summary: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.
cast: Richard Briers|Kate Beckinsale|Imelda Staunton|Jimmy Yuill|Brian Blessed|Andy Hockley|Chris Barnes|Conrad Nelson|Phyllida Law|Emma Thompson|Alex Lowe|Denzel Washington|Keanu Reeves|Richard Clifford|Gerard Horan|Robert Sean Leonard|Kenneth Branagh|Patrick Doyle|Alex Scott|Michael Keaton|Ben Elton|Edward Jewesbury
keywords: directed by star|shakespeare's much ado about nothing|based on play|multi plot|italy
title: Mucho ruido y pocas nueces
